preconditions.precondition: Game GUI is loaded and visible to the User

mainSequence.step: User writes username in the username input field
PacManController updates the GUI
PacManController retrieves the username from the input field
PacManController receives the username from the input field
PacManController validates the username
PacManUser confirms the username validation
PacManController enables the start button
User clicks on the start button
Start button click is handled by PacManController
PacManController sets the username in the game
PacManController sets the initial score
Game starts
Game is over
PacManController saves the highscore for the user
PacManPersistence accesses the file reader
FileReader retrieves the scores data
PacManPersistence creates a new user with username and score
PacManUser receives the new user data
PacManPersistence accesses the file writer
FileWriter updates the scores data with the new user
